Giant's Minion Hansen:
You got rid of Kampf as well as the chief of the Embryo-loving Varka Silenoses. What an achievement! I believe our work together is finished.
But I'll continue tracking Embryo. They will definitely hatch some new plot.
Regarding your great achievement this time, I will report to Kekropus in detail. We, the Giant's Minions, will always remember you. Thank you.
